/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/stream.dir/src/gelu.cu.o CMakeFiles/stream.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/stream.dir/src/stream.cu.o CMakeFiles/stream.dir/src/timer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/stream.dir/src/utils.cpp.o -o stream   -L/usr/local/cuda-12.4/lib64  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-12.4/lib64 /usr/local/cuda-12.4/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.a -lcudart -lcublas -lcudnn -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
